value:
$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|So, the unthinkable has finally
come to pass...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|What was that, Commander?
Is there something amiss?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|It pains me to admit this, but...
the Order of Heroes is broke!$k$pThe Kingdom of Askr does provide
a sizable stipend, of course, but it
can only stretch so thin!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|It is true that we've been seeing
a LOT of new faces around here
recently, isn't it...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|YES! I mean... Yes. Exactly! And
maybe some of them would like
to see a bit more of the action.$k$pI think it's about time we put all
those Heroes to work. To, er...
leverage our resources!$k$pWho's out scouting lore? Maybe it's
time to focus on the here and now...
Or at the very least the here!$k$pOur own world is rich with histories,
and there are libraries and museums
that'd pay handsomely for them.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|I suppose it would be beneficial to
have an independent source of
supplementary income...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Smile|I knew you'd see it my way! In that
case, I leave the details in your able
hands, $Nu.$k$p$EFace|Just get those Heroes out scouting
for any books that appear valuable.
Our future depends on those funds!$k$p
